**Please read the [FAQ](https://github.com/dlk3/autokey-wayland/wiki/FAQ-%E2%80%90-Frequently-Asked-Questions) before submitting a new bug report**

**Describe the bug:**
- What happened?
- What did you expect to happen?
- In what environment are you running AutoKey?

**Attach a debug log:""
- [] Stop AutoKey,
- [] Erase the <code>!/.local/share/autokey/autokey.log</code> file,
- [] Start AutoKey with the "-v" command line option,
- [] Recreate the problem
- [] Remove any personally identifiable information, including passwords, from the <code>!/.local/share/autokey/autokey.log</code> file,
- [] Drag and drop the <code>~/.local/share/autokey/autokey.log</code> here.
